content.text:
# Draft:Why warthunder is bad and good

Warthunder is difficult and easy but why is that?
If you watch youtubers then regularly get games where they win fast but never lose! So dear reader as you wondered how do they do it! Well simple some have played for years some for longer a decade maybe, some have skill.
But now to summarize it i guess so the answer is!
Sometimes you get absolute noobs sd teammates and sometimes you get lvl 100 enemies! Or the other way around either way get good and that's it!
